channel.title: Music on The B0ardside
channel.description: Recent content in Music on The B0ardside

item.title: Dalriada - scottish skate video by Iron Giraffe
item.description: Check this awesome new skate video out of Scotland - great stuff! Even a wee shot of Toby Patterson in there! DALRIADA from Iron Giraffe on Vimeo.

item.title: TidalCycles Tutorials
item.description: Alex McLean’s TidalCycles has been a big influence on my own Soundb0ard, and lately, now that my instruments are mostly built, I’ve been looking for ways to algorithmically modify them more. This series of howto’s by Mike Hodnick/Kindohm have been an amazing source of inspiration - super clear and very entertaining - here’s the first episode:

item.title: Guardian piece on Algorave
item.description: Nice piece from the Guardian showcasing the Algorave scene in Sheffield. Big up Alex McLean!

item.title: Making Music and Art Through Machine Learning
item.description: This is a good chat with Doug Eck, of the Google Magenta project It’s a project I’ve been keeping an eye on, as it has a ton of potential. I’ve generated some melodies based on their Melody RNN - although i need to spend more time with it, as I’ve been more focussed on own generative algorithms.

item.title: Robert Henke Granulator
item.description: Hmm, my granular synth hasn’t quite come together yet, but I’m learning a load. This is a pretty informative (promo) video from Robert Henke/Monolake showcasing his ‘Granulator’ plugin for Ableton Live. If i can get mine to sound anything like that i’ll be stoked!

item.title: Palmbomen II - Memories of Cindy
item.description: Have you been watching season 3 of Twin Peaks? so fscking good! This is kinda up there – Memories Of Cindy Pt. 1 Memories Of Cindy Pt. 2 Looking forward to receiving the second volume in the mail. Grab a copy

item.title: Plainview Public Access
item.description: This is a crazy awesome animation by Anthony Lombardo and John Chrostek – “It is one-o-clock in the morning. You’ve had a long and tiresome day, and despite your best intentions, dozed off far before you meant to. Asleep in the embrace of your old blue La-Z-Boy, you feel a flicker like a breeze full of static at room temperature. You awaken. The television is still on. Your eyes adjust.

item.title: Shit Present - Kick Me
item.description: Awesome video for awesome track! Found via Ben’s blog

item.title: B0ardcast 28
item.description:
Here’s this week’s B0ardcast, broadcast on BFF.fm every friday. The B0ardcast Episode 28 by Sideb0ard on Mixcloud
Tracklist::: Dhobi Fats - She Wants A Daisy Betty And The Werewolves - Should I go to Glasgow? Orange Juice - Poor Old Soul (Part 1) halfsour - target practice (henry’s dress cover) Japanther - All We Got Is Each Other (Peanucle) Kitten Crisis - Yer Hair Braves - True Feelings peach kelli pop - Bat Wing

item.title: B0ardcasts on Mixcloud
item.description: Here’s a link to the Mixcloud page with the past couple of B0ardcast shows and tracklistings.. The B0ardside Episode #4 - 03/04/2014 by Sideb0ard on Mixcloud

item.title: Tense Men - RNRFON
item.description: Love this new video for Tense Men - It’s all shot around Stoke Newington in London, super close to Pat’s old house.

item.title: The B0ardcast Cometh
item.description: Woop! I just got confirmation on friday that I’ll have a regular weekly 2 hour radio starting this tuesday on bff.fm - a recent new station out of here in San Francisco. Tune in - 2pm-4pm PST (10pm-Midnite UK) –

item.title: Oh yeah, Codetraxx
item.description: Oh yeah, that Codetraxx project I mentioned, which me and Tack have been working on - here’s a recording made using it. All samples included in the repo too..

item.title: Street Punk
item.description: Oh man, just found this Hunx album from 2013 - i had seen this following video for Bad Skin but forgot about the album when it came out - this video is so disgusting and totally my anthem!

item.title: The B0ardside Top 13 records 2013
item.description: Was hard to cut two out from this selection, so here’s my top 12 for the past year, as usual a bit of a mix between the rock n roll and the electronic noise.. The Pastels – Slow Summit The Spook School – Dress Up Radiator Hospital – Something Wild Zomby – With Love Wyatt Blair – Banana Cream Dream Four Tet – Beautiful Rewind

item.title: Record Store Bot
item.description: First draft of my Record Store Bot is live over on Github - basically tying a Chatbot::Eliza style interface to Last.fm web services for an interactive (hopefully amusing) music recommendation bot. Works surprisingly well - although only has one method at the moment..
